short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OFCreator Tools, the ultimate tool for optimising your work on OnlyFans, so you can focus on the important things.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best Onlyfans chrome extension for creators to manage their onlyfans like the top 1%. We have a ton of amazing features that save you time, and help you make more money.

Features:
====================

1) Fan Info: You can look at the total amount spent by each fan in chat view, so you can focus your energies only towards paying fans and avoid freeloaders.

2) Auto - Follow Expired Fans: You can follow upto 100 expired fans each day with the click of a button, so you can send a PPV request to them, along with your active fans. Make Expired fans a revenue source .

3) Vault Media tagging: Our extension will tag all media you have sent to a fan when you open the vault in chat view, so you can avoid sending repeats.

We have a lot more features coming soon such as an emoji bar, notes to save PPV requests for later, etc , however its free while we are in BETA access :)

====================
